TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Pongodan, title = Pongodan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pongodan} }

S.FORM: = Pongodan = Gaga mniq Taytung Taytungsu ka alang Pongodan. 397 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 1,040 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 58% niqan 600 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 42% niqan 440 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis47%, Paiwan1%, Bunun1%, Puyuma5%, ni rahuq na o3%.

= Pongodan = Gaga mniq Taytong Taytongso ka alang Pongodan. 397 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 1,040 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 58% niqan 600 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 42% niqan 440 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis47%, Paiwan1%, Bonon1%, Poyoma5%, ni rahoq na o3%.
